commandDescription: Splits globalvaluesets into various csv files
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input globalvaluesets. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output globalvaluesets. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a globalvalueset file in input. Example: MyGlobalValueSet.globalvalueset-meta.xml
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
